original_text:
He has pity on the weak and the needy,
    and saves the lives of the needy.
korean_text: 그는 가난한 자와 궁핍한 자를 불쌍히 여기며 궁핍한 자의 생명을 구원하며

sentences.original_text: He has pity on the weak and the needy
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 약한 자와 궁핍한 자를 불쌍히 여기며

sentences.original_text: and saves the lives of the needy.
